name: Office Breakdown
description:
Office Breakdown

Made in Unity during 48 hours for GAMEHIGHED Jam 2021.

One day, a normal employee goes crazy after his boss mistreated him.

Boss 'Ohh my dear employee, you gotta work overtime for weeks. Umm, of course because of the pandemic, you know ehehe. By the way, you won't be able to get the overtime pay. I regret to say that we will have to fire you soon. The company is in a difficult situation these days. Okay, go back to work now' he said.

Right after that, our hero tied his head and is determined to have the last say: YoLoOo!

[Team & Credits]
Zilyanus: Programmer
Jasmine Jardim: Game Composer
Ege Canıbek: 2D Pixel ArtistElevator Music: Casa Bossa Nova by Kevin MacLeod

[How To Play]

[W][A][S][D] - Movement
[Left Click] - Punch, Grab Object
[Right Click] - Throw Object

[Escape] - Back to Main Menu

[R] - Restart the floor

[H] - Skip the first floor while cutscene

You have to take the elevator to go to the next level.
